thread.section_title: ZipRecruiter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ZipRecruiter | ziprecruiter.com | 3 of 178
thread.title: Jarrod

author: Jarrod
title: Jarrod
text:
Excellent service. Representative was very helpful and very friendly. I was provided with several good ideas to increase the quality and quantity of candidates applying to my post. The representative was very patient and worked with me to implement those changes while we are on the phone.
Additionally, I was able to get someone on the phone with only a few prompts.
